Class GameHUD

java.lang.Object
de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.gui.GuiComponent
ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.screens.GameHUD
All Implemented Interfaces:
de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.graphics.IRenderable, de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.tweening.Tweenable, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener
public class GameHUD extends de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.gui.GuiComponent
Heads-up display component for showing player information such as remaining time and collected crystals. Scales and renders UI elements based on the current game window resolution.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.gui.GuiComponent

    ICON_FONT

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameHUD()
    Creates a new HUD component positioned at the top-left corner.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    render(Graphics2D g)
    Renders the HUD, including scaled background, time remaining, and the number of remaining crystals.
